ImmuMicrobiome 0.1.1

    • ImmuMicrobiome_vignette

    Preprocess relative abundance.

    log_ratio.Rd

    Process zero values and produce ratios for slide_z(). This function requires a zero_treatment value, make sure to use neg_dispersion to see which method is the most convenient and accurate for your data.

    log_ratio(
  df,
  positive_sorted_sample,
  negative_sorted_sample,
  second_negative_sample,
  zero_treatment
)

    Arguments

    df

    A dataframe given by seq_table().

    positive_sorted_sample

    Positive sorted sample pattern.

    negative_sorted_sample

    First negative sorted sample pattern.

    second_negative_sample

    Second negative sorted sample pattern.

    zero_treatment

    Zero treatment to apply, see random_generation(), no_zero() or minimum_count().

    Value

    Return a dataframe for each sample containing :

    log10_abundance

    The \(log10(pos*neg1)\) ratio

    log2_ratio

    The \(log2(pos1/neg1)\)

    log2_neg_ratio

    The \(log2(neg1/neg2)\)

    log10_neg_abundance

    The \(log10(neg1*neg2)\)

    taxa

    A collapsed taxonomy

    Examples

    Contents
